The current valid map is identified by **Map code and version**: TF1.5.web.map v2.0.


> Locations of pan, brackish and saline wetlands were taken from the Global Lakes and Wetlands Database GLWD3 class 7 from Lehner and DÃ¶ll (2004). .

::: {.cell}

:::


You can download and use this file from the following sources:

- Zenodo repository (EFG map) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG files](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091060))
 - Zenodo repository (bundle of maps) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG versions in compressed file](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419))

::: {.cell}

:::

This section provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**TF1.5 Episodic arid floodplains**](/efg-info/TF1_5.qmd).


::: {.cell}

:::

## Available maps

These maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group.

- Web navigation (**code: TF1.5.web.map**, version v2.0) 
 - Web navigation (**code: TF1.5.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) 

## Map files

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

TF1.5.web.map (v2.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/TF1.5.web.map_v2.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419) :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091060) :: [GitHub repository](layers/TF1.5.web.map_v2.0_topo.json) :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/) :: [GitHub repository](TF1.5.web.map_v2.0_topo.json)
TF1.5.WM.nwx (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.TF1_5_WM_nwx)

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
